alert.note: Alert for Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 9:14PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Taylor County through 1000 PM CDT... At 914 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tuscola, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tuscola, Buffalo Gap, Lawn, Camp Tonkawa and Ovalo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for west central Texas.
